summary: A special item that allows you to transfer ALL of your inventory to any container.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a special diamond, with no weight or value, that allows you to transfer ALL of your inventory to any container instantly.  Just open the container, put the Stone of Storall in, and close the container.  Instantly, your entire inventory (excepting quest items) will be transferred to the container.

To obtain the item, use the console:

1.  Type in [color=red]HELP STORALL[/color] (note the spelling), and the console will show you the baseID of the Stone of Storall.

2.  Type in [color=red]PLAYER.ADDITEM XXXXXXXX 1[/color], with the Xs replaced by the eight digit number (which may contain letters) shown in step 1.  You should get a message in the upper left corner that says \\\"Stone of Storall added.\\\"

Hoarders of Skyrim, rejoice!
author: Gizmologist
